com.geodrop.DropPay

Class PortChallenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geodrop.GeodropRequest
      • com.geodrop.DropPay.PortChallenge

  • public class PortChallenge
extends GeodropRequest
    Request used to challenge customer to confirm the telephone number in content provider initiated transaction
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    A-Tono s.r.l.
